yelp_reviews.author: Ligma B.
yelp_reviews.review: These are one of the worst apartments I've ever been in. The place is old on the inside even tho it looks nice on the outside. The counters are old and chipping off the cupboards are falling apart old appliances old carpet ext. I would not recommend ever living here.

ownerResponse.text: Hi, Ligma. Thanks for reaching out regarding your concerns about condition in your apartment. We value your feedback and use your comments to help us provide top-notch service for all our residents. We're sorry for any inconvenience you might have experienced. Please email us at meadows@fpimgt.com so we can discuss this matter further and find a satisfactory solution as soon as possible. We look forward to hearing from you.
